## Backline Requirements

### What We Bring

- [ ] Drumsticks & accessories

### What We Need from Venue

- [ ] If house kit available: Bass drum, floor tom, rack tom, snare stand, hi-hat stand, 2x cymbal stands
  - *We prefer to use our own kit but can work with house kit if needed*

#### Amplification

## Sound Requirements

### Input List

| # | Instrument/Source | Mic Type | Stand | Notes |
|---|-------------------|----------|-------|-------|
| 1 | Kick Drum | Shure Beta 52A or equivalent | - | Inside/outside |
| 2 | Snare Top | Shure SM57 or equivalent | Short boom | - |
| 3 | Snare Bottom | Shure SM57 or equivalent | Short boom | Optional |
| 4 | Hi-Hat | Small condenser | Short boom | - |
| 5 | Rack Tom | Sennheiser e604 or SM57 | Clip/short boom | - |
| 6 | Floor Tom | Sennheiser e604 or SM57 | Clip/short boom | - |
| 7 | Overhead L | Condenser | Tall boom | - |
| 8 | Overhead R | Condenser | Tall boom | - |
| 9 | Fabi - Vocal | Shure SM58 or Beta 58A | Tall boom | - |
| 10 | Guitar Amp | Shure SM57 or equivalent | Short boom | - |
| 11 | Bass Amp | Shure Beta 52A or DI | Short boom/- | Mic + DI preferred |
| 12 | [Additional vocals] | Shure SM58 or Beta 58A | Tall boom | If needed |
| 13 | [Additional guitar] | Shure SM57 or equivalent | Short boom | If needed |

**Total Channels Required**: [NUMBER] minimum

- **Bass**: 1x monitor wedge

**Total Monitors Required**: [NUMBER] wedges

*We can also work with in-ear monitors if available*

### Front of House
- Professional mixing console with minimum [NUMBER] channels
- PA system appropriate for venue size
- Subwoofers for low-end support (metal needs that bass!)
- EQ and dynamics processing

## Lighting Requirements

### Minimum Lighting
- [ ] Basic stage wash (red, blue, white)
- [ ] Front light
- [ ] Back light
- [ ] Ability to adjust for mood/song dynamics

### Preferred Lighting
- [ ] Moving heads or intelligent lights
- [ ] Strobe capability (for breakdowns! ðŸ¤˜)
- [ ] Haze/fog machine (atmospheric effect)
- [ ] LED par cans for color mixing
- [ ] Lighting operator (if available)

**Lighting Notes**: We're happy to discuss a basic lighting plan if you have an operator. If not, static dark/moody lighting works great for metal.

---

## Power Requirements

- [ ] Minimum 3x 20A circuits for backline
- [ ] Separate circuit for lighting
- [ ] Power outlets accessible from stage

**Note**: Please ensure all power is clean and properly grounded to avoid hum/buzz.
